title: Scientists put ichthyosaurs in virtual water tanks

title_detail.value: Scientists put ichthyosaurs in virtual water tanks

summary: Using computer simulations and 3D models, paleontologists have uncovered more detail on how Mesozoic sea dragons swam.

summary_detail.value: Using computer simulations and 3D models, paleontologists have uncovered more detail on how Mesozoic sea dragons swam.
